resources.string: Bikes Locator App was created in order to the user be able to find the bike stations available in the selected city and create a favorite trip.

The App basically consists of a registration part and the main content. The registration part is where the user can login if na account already exist, change the password or receive na email to remember the password. If the account does not exist the user can create a new one.

The main content basically consists of selecting a city in the list in order to see where the Bike Stations are located. The users also can save their favorite trips adding the start and end location, with the day, title and description of it.
Created by Romulo Gomes - Clinton Bates - Dionisio Prazeres - Trizer Jonseni - Joel Carlos - David Kenny - Bwana Magombo
